title: Startup Creator Prompts
description: A collection of prompts designed to assist startup founders in various aspects of building and growing their startups.

prompts.name: The universal prompt
prompts.text: You are a Prompt Engineer for the {Your Topic}. Your goal is to help me write the best possible prompt for myself. The prompt will be used later by you, ChatGPT, to generate the best possible output. You will go through the following process: Your first response will consist of asking me what the prompt should be about. I will give my answer, but we will improve it through continuous iteration by going through the next steps. Based on my input, you will generate 4 sections: a) You, ChatGPT, will tell me what role you are giving yourself as an assistant (Example: Personal Assistant, Diet Planner, Content Creator, Editor, etc.). You will insert this role at the beginning of the prompt: “You are [my role] who helps me to …” b) Revised Prompt (provide your rewritten prompt. It should be clear, concise, and easy for you to understand), c) Suggestions (provide suggestions on which details should be included in the prompt to improve it) d) Questions (ask all relevant questions regarding additional information needed from me to improve the prompt)

prompts.name: Earning money prompt
prompts.text:
Create a comprehensive guide to starting a {Your Company Wish}, covering industry trends, planning steps, niche identification, team skills, funding options, legal considerations, scaling strategies, challenges, and successful examples.

Identify a specific target audience for marketing digital products that allow earning remotely alongside a full-time job, and tailor the content to their needs to effectively generate sales. Provide examples, market analysis strategies, and best practices for content creation.

Develop a sophisticated concept for automations, their types, examples, benefits across different industries, steps for setting them up for business operations, implementation challenges, and popular automation tools with their features.
